level.heading: Effect of marriage or domestic partnership.
level.text: A premarital agreement becomes effective upon marriage or the registration of a domestic partnership under § 32-702.

level.heading: Effect of Amendments
level.text: D.C. Law 16-79 rewrote section which had read as follows:
"A premarital agreement becomes effective upon marriage."

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-501.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon § 4 of the Uniform Premarital Agreement Act. See 9C Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
